EmailTemplate.subject: We Help Businesses Like Yours Every Day
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-pangea-pod-hotel.aspx?cmp=EBPANGEAPOD2019EN&utm_source=Marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=GZ+Disengaged+Nurture+BS+Explicit+&utm_content=Disengaged+Stream]]> We Love Your Success <[[http://www.example.com]]> From small start-ups with big ideas, to mid-sized companies that are already well-established, plus everything in between – supporting businesses is what we do. But don’t just take our word for it! “For us it’s a matter of suppliers or partners who we can rely on. We have lots of small orders for stationary and small office supplies. We needed reasonable prices and when we need stuff we get it in short order. It’s a trouble free relationship you don’t have to think about.” - Russell and Jelena King, Pangea Pod Hotel Read Their Story <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-pangea-pod-hotel.aspx?cmp=EBPANGEAPOD2019EN&utm_source=Marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=GZ+Disengaged+Nurture+BS+Explicit+&utm_content=Disengaged+Stream]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx]]> Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx]]> Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx]]> View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1 866 391‑8111 © 2019 Grand & Toy Limited
